content.query:
create DATABASE test

USE TEST
go
CREATE SCHEMA Staging

---------------------------------
create or alter view Staging.vw_Agent as(
select
   Agents.AgentNumber
from openrowset(
        BULK 'https://dlssynap1.dfs.core.windows.net/lf-data/calisto/agent/AgentData_20211111000000.JSON',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    ) with (doc nvarchar(max)) as rows
    cross apply openjson (doc)
        with (  Results nvarchar(max) AS JSON ) As Results
OUTER APPLY OPENJSON(Results)--, '$.LicenseNumber')   
     WITH (
              AgentNumber   varchar(200) '$.AgentNumber'  ,
              LanguageSet nvarchar(MAX) N'$.LanguageSet' AS JSON  ,
              LicenseSet nvarchar(MAX) N'$.LicenseSet' AS JSON           
     ) AS Agents
)
GO
----
create or alter view Staging.vw_AgentLicense as(
select
   Agents.AgentNumber, LicenseSet.LicensePCNumber ,  LicenseSet.PrimaryLic
from openrowset(
        BULK 'https://dlssynap1.dfs.core.windows.net/lf-data/calisto/agent/AgentData_20211111000000.JSON',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    ) with (doc nvarchar(max)) as rows
    cross apply openjson (doc)
        with (  Results nvarchar(max) AS JSON ) As Results
OUTER APPLY OPENJSON(Results)--, '$.LicenseNumber')   
     WITH (
              AgentNumber   varchar(200) '$.AgentNumber'  ,
              LanguageSet nvarchar(MAX) N'$.LanguageSet' AS JSON  ,
              LicenseSet nvarchar(MAX) N'$.LicenseSet' AS JSON           
     ) AS Agents        
OUTER APPLY OPENJSON(Agents.LicenseSet)--, '$.LicenseNumber')   
     WITH (LicensePCNumber VARCHAR(500)  '$.LicensePCNumber',
            PrimaryLic VARCHAR(500)  '$.PrimaryLicense'
     ) AS LicenseSet
)
GO
----

create or alter view Staging.vw_AgentLanguage as(
select
   Agents.AgentNumber, LanguageSet.Language
from openrowset(
        BULK 'https://dlssynap1.dfs.core.windows.net/lf-data/calisto/agent/AgentData_20211111000000.JSON',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    ) with (doc nvarchar(max)) as rows
    cross apply openjson (doc)
        with (  Results nvarchar(max) AS JSON ) As Results
OUTER APPLY OPENJSON(Results)--, '$.LicenseNumber')   
     WITH (
              AgentNumber   varchar(200) '$.AgentNumber'  ,
              LanguageSet nvarchar(MAX) N'$.LanguageSet' AS JSON  ,
              LicenseSet nvarchar(MAX) N'$.LicenseSet' AS JSON           
     ) AS Agents        
OUTER APPLY OPENJSON(Agents.LanguageSet)--, '$.LicenseNumber')   
     WITH (Language VARCHAR(500)  '$.Language' ) AS LanguageSet     
)
GO
